channel.title: Pizza?!?!
channel.description:
Note: this is very true, i even took a screenshot of it!! xP
So i was recently playing Black Mesa: Source, when i happen to stumble something of interest. the level of "Chapter_11"
area: c2a4e, where you happen to see "The G-Man" spying on you.
now this is how it goes, if you activate cheats on the console, and "No-clip" where he's at, there on the Wall... written in blood reads:
"THE PIZZA IS A LIE!?!?" ????? i just can't explain that part... :frowning:

item.title: Pizza?!?!

item.description:
Hasn’t that been the situation the last years anyway?

item.title: Pizza?!?!

item.description:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13735

It’s to do with an ARG, that’s… Pretty much hit a rock wall at the moment. Pizzas and stuff like that are scattered everywhere.

now this is how it goes, if you activate cheats on the console, and "No-clip" where he's at, there on the Wall...  written in blood reads:
